entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming south 30 gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
